message.entry: Input for the {0} argument must be a scalar.
Input for the {0} argument must be a character vector.
Class name {0} cannot be read from the stream as it is unsupported.
Mode {0} is not a valid stream mode.
Invalid end of record ''{0}''. End of record must be ''\\r\\n'' or a single character.
Encoding input must be used with text mode.
Could not open stream due to an unknown error. This may be due to file permission issues.
The stream must be open for this operation. Please open the stream by calling ''open''.
The stream is already open and cannot be reopened. Please call ''close'' and try again.
